title: I don't think I've seen a Warwick have a bad game..
body:
Every time I play with or against him, he's fucking fed. He has sustain, dmg, tankyness, 2 hard cc's, ms of udyr on steroids, dmg reduction.
I mean, not saying op, just that he's always somehow fed and kills anyone with cinderhulk - titanic. If I'll see him more, I'm gonna start to ban him. fuck that wolf

replies.body:
Ok. 
What was the point of this post again? WW op? 
next.

I've seen plenty that have had bad games.

He's horrifically weak to flat true dmg and smart teams instantly peel him once his ult connects with someone, which isn't hard to do in this meta where everyone and their mother has CC. Also, he kind of sucks ass since he's good at getting picks but this meta is filled with supports that do not allow you to pick the adc.
I have never seen one have a good game on SR post-rework.
